16686.title: evening ensemble
16686.title_notes: A) top B) pants C) sash
16686.description: tie dye, Chinese pyjama bottom, straight grain cardigan jacket
16686.provenance: David W. Campbell, New York, New York; (Stan Weaver, New York, New York); given to the Indianapolis Museum of Art in 1986.
16686.dimensions:
A) top: length 32-1/4 in. 
B) pants: length 44-1/2 in.
C) sash: length 73 in.

extended_text.content:
Halston revamped the 1930s pajama into cocktail and evening attire by making them out of sheer fabrics.

The Chinese-style pajama trousers are paired with a straight-grain cardigan jacket.
extended_text.title: Gallery Label

16686.exhibit_history:
Simply Halston
Paul Fashion Arts Gallery, IMA
April 13, 2008 - January 4, 2009
